Section.Catchline: Title insurance agents; certain names prohibited.

SectionBody.Text: After October 1, 1985, a title insurance agent as defined in s. 626.841 shall not adopt a name which contains the words “title insurance,” “title guaranty,” or “title guarantee,” unless such words are followed by the word “agent” or “agency” in the same size and type as the words preceding them. This section does not apply to a title insurer acting as an agent for another title insurer.
